description.en:
Was I reborn? In my previous life I was a designer who had just graduated but one day I had an accident. Adelaide, that's my new name. My new life feels very boring, but then I heard news that there is a girl who can move between dimensions so I decided to go to the capital to meet her. Is there something waiting for me in the capital?

---
17 years after her own reincarnation, Adelaide hears that a dimensional traveler has suddenly arrived at the imperial palace. Just the jolt of excitement my boring life needed, she thought!

Attending the debutant ball to meet this new Susanne, Adelaide ends up making a deal with the handsome duke Felix: become his “fake” fiancée so he can keep the gold-digging Susanne away from him! As Felix warms to his companion, can Adelaide win this battle for his heart?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/50584275), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/adelaide)

**Official Translation:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/adelaide/1)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/adelaide)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Adelaide/2396)
description.fr:
Au bal des débutantes, elle est bien la seule à ne pas être là pour les beaux yeux du duc. Dans les couloirs du palais, ils vont pourtant nouer un pacte secret. Un pacte, qui pourrait bien mener à l'amour... Elle ne voulait initialement qu’une chose, rencontrer la mystérieuse voyageuse interdimensionnelle apparue au bord d’un lac. Depuis 17 ans qu’elle s’ennuyait dans ce monde, pas question de laisser passer ce type d’événement surnaturel!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/50584275), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/adelaide)

**Official Translation:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/adelaide/1)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/adelaide)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Adelaide/2396)
description.it:
17 anni dopo la propria reincarnazione, Adelaide sente che un viaggiatore dimensionale è arrivato improvvisamente al palazzo imperiale. "Era la scossa di eccitazione di cui la mia vita noiosa aveva bisogno", pensò lei! Partecipando al ballo delle debuttanti per incontrare questa nuova ragazza, Adelaide finisce per stringere un accordo con il bel duca Felix:

---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/50584275), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/adelaide)

**Official Translation:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/adelaide/1)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/adelaide)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Adelaide/2396)
description.ja:
アデルことアデライドは交通事故に遭い、侯爵の娘として生まれ変わってしまう。転生した地・ビチェルン帝都で16歳まで過ごしていたが、ある日不思議なニュースを聞く。帝都に異次元から漆黒の髪と瞳を持つ少女が現れた…。アデライドはいてもたってもいられず帝都に向かうのだが、待っていたのはイケメン公爵との契約結婚!?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/50584275), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/adelaide)

**Official Translation:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/adelaide/1)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/adelaide)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Adelaide/2396)
description.ko:
갑자기 교통사고를 당하고 환생한 지 17년.
지루하기만 했던 아델라이드 인생에 날아든 대박! 대박! 대박사건!!

“뭐라고? 황궁에 차원 이동자가 나타났다고?”

차원 이동자 수잔을 만나기 위해 제도로 올라온 아델에게 의외의 만남이 기다리고 있었다.
엘리아스 공작 펠릭스는 공작 부인 자리를 노리는 수잔을 떼어놓기 위해 아델에게 계약 약혼을 제안하지만,어째… 뱀 잡으려다 여우를 만난 꼴?!
그리고 마침내 마주친 차원 이동자 수잔의 정체!!!!

빨간 머리, 푸른 눈.
너무 사랑스러운 내숭제로 ‘사이다’ 그녀 아델라이드가 온다!

앙큼발랄 환생소녀 아델과 철혈공작 펠릭스의 코민 로맨스!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/50584275), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/adelaide)

**Official Translation:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/adelaide/1)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/adelaide)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Adelaide/2396)
description.pt-br:
Eu renasci? Na minha vida anterior, eu era um designer que tinha acabado de se formar e, um dia, sofri um acidente. Adelaide, é a nova vida que eu recebi, minha vida é muito chata, mas de repente há notícias de que há uma garota de várias dimensões apareceu na capital e decidi ir para a capital. Há algo esperando na capital?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/50584275), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/adelaide)

**Official Translation:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/adelaide/1)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/adelaide)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Adelaide/2396)
description.uk:
Героїня потрапляє в аварію та перероджується в аристократку в іншому світі. Не зважаючи на спогади з попереднього життя вона проживає своє спокійне життя, до того моменту, як зі столиці до неї не доходять плітки про жінку, яка мандрує між вимірами. Тоді Аделаїда вирішує відправитись в столицю, щоб зустрітися з тією жінкою. Та що її там чекає?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/50584275), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/adelaide)

**Official Translation:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/adelaide/1)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/adelaide)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Adelaide/2396)
